content.new:
I ran Gazebo 1.5.0 just fine with no GUI, launching the PR2 through ROS. 

However, when I used the same launch file (again with the no gui option) but when logged into the same machine over SSH, the instance of Gazebo segfaulted immediately after I sp
content.old:
I ran Gazebo 1.5.0 just fine with no GUI, launching the PR2 through ROS. 

However, when I used the same launch file (again with the no gui option) but when logged into the same machine over SSH, the instance of Gazebo segfaulted immediately after I sp

issue.title: Running Camera Drivers without X Server Causes Segfault

message.raw: I believe this is fixed in more recent versions of Gazebo. Atlas, Valkyrie, and PR2 can be run in headless mode on Amazon EC2 machines. Please re-open if you still experience this problem.
message.html: I believe this is fixed in more recent versions of Gazebo. Atlas, Valkyrie, and PR2 can be run in headless mode on Amazon EC2 machines. Please re-open if you still experience this problem.
